programme.desc: Following the imprisonment of her brother (Sam Rockwell), a woman (Hilary Swank) earns a law degree and fights to clear him of murder.

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair
programme.desc: A billionaire (Pierce Brosnan) looking for new challenges attracts the attention of an investigator (Rene Russo) when a priceless Monet is stolen.

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Jason Bourne (Matt Damon) continues his international quest to uncover his true identity while staying one step ahead of those who want to kill him.

programme.title: Hotel Mumbai

programme.desc: A misfit boy (Kodi Smit-McPhee) suspects that his only friend (Chloë Grace Moretz), an eerie child who only appears at night, is hiding a terrible secret.

programme.title: Hotel Artemis
programme.desc: As rioting rocks Los Angeles in the year 2028, an arms dealer, a French assassin, disgruntled thieves and an injured cop make their way to Hotel Artemis -- a members-only hospital for criminals that's operated by a high-tech healer called the Nurse.

programme.title: The Edge

programme.title: I Am Wrath

programme.title: American Heist

programme.title: Line of Duty

programme.title: Leatherheads
programme.desc: A 1920s football star (George Clooney) tries to give his sagging sport a boost, while he and a new teammate (John Krasinski) vie for the affections of a feisty newswoman (Renée Zellweger).

programme.title: The Dead Don't Die
programme.desc: The citizens of the sleepy little town of Centerville find themselves under attack by flesh-eating zombies when the dead rise from their graves.

programme.title: Mass Ave
programme.desc: A racial profiling incident forever changes the relationship between a man and his son.

programme.title: Barbershop 2: Back in Business

programme.title: Obvious Child
programme.desc: An immature, newly unemployed comic (Jenny Slate) must navigate the murky waters of adulthood after her fling with a graduate student (Jake Lacy) results in an unplanned pregnancy.

programme.title: Luce
programme.desc: A liberal-minded couple are forced to reconsider their image of their adopted son after he writes a disturbing essay for a class assignment.

programme.desc: Detective Jack Radcliff gets a shocking phone call from his recently murdered niece Ashley. Working together across time, they race to solve the crime before it can happen.

programme.title: Paycheck
programme.desc: After learning that his memory has been erased, a technical wizard (Ben Affleck) goes on the run to piece together clues from his past.

programme.title: Hustle & Flow

programme.title: Extortion

programme.title: The Vanishing of Sidney Hall

programme.title: Elizabethtown

programme.title: I Now Pronounce You Chuck and Larry

programme.title: Yes Man

programme.title: House at the End of the Street

programme.title: The Field Guide to Evil

programme.title: Life After Beth

programme.title: Laggies

programme.desc: Lucy casts a spell; Rusty and the rest of their friends try to toughen Zach up.
